What it is: Constructs a symbolic reflection room to encounter your current psychic image.
How to use it: Ask AI to describe what your inner world would look like if turned into a symbolic mirror chamber.
What it changes: Externalizes subconscious self-image for inspection and redesign.

What it is: Evaluates your life phases through metaphor rather than chronology.
How to use it: Describe your life in symbolic chapters (e.g., 'the cave', 'the burning bridge'). Ask AI to label transitions.
What it changes: Creates mythic cohesion across lived experience.

What it is: Designs symbolic rebellions against the version of you that stayed small.
How to use it: Describe your suppressed instincts. Ask AI to architect symbolic protests that reassert aliveness.

What it is: Translates recurring physical symptoms into symbolic messages.
How to use it: Name a chronic sensation (tight chest, jaw pain, etc). Ask AI to offer symbolic interpretations.
What it changes: Links body states to unspoken emotional needs.

What it is: Detects when your perceived future is too narrow or pre-scripted.
How to use it: Describe your future vision. Ask AI to generate 5 radical alternate symbolic futures.

What it is: Constructs an internal symbolic structure where rejected emotions can safely be felt.
How to use it: Describe an emotion you suppress. Ask AI to build a safe symbolic house for it.
What it changes: Creates inner capacity to metabolize overwhelming feelings.

What it is: Deconstructs the origin story of your core values.
How to use it: List your top values. Ask AI to trace when and why each value was adopted.
What it changes: Refines inherited morality into conscious choice.

What it is: Visualizes the energetic and symbolic lines between you and others.
How to use it: Describe a confusing relationship. Ask AI to map symbolic oversteps and gaps in boundary lines.
What it changes: Clarifies relational terrain and rebuilds sovereignty.

What it is: Finds mythic or literary patterns repeating across your life events.
How to use it: List formative events. Ask AI to match them to archetypal story beats.

What it is: Catalogs psychic scar tissue and where symbolic calcification limits growth.
How to use it: Describe recurring emotional pain. Ask AI to identify the scar pattern and design symbolic softening.
What it changes: Promotes healing where armor became prison.
